formulas.name: SpermCollectionSite
formulas.expression: IF({!TypeofSample}="Ejaculate", "e", IF({!TypeofSample}="Retrograde", "o", IF({!TypeofSample}="Aspirate", "p", IF({!TypeofSample}="Open Biopsy","t",IF({!TypeofSample}="From Another Clinic", "u", "u")))))

formulas.name: SpermSourceANZARD
formulas.expression: IF({!Semen_Source}="Partner", " 1= A male intending parent", "2= A sperm donor outside of the intending parents")
